title: I\'ve been doing some research on the racial fires,bombings and cross burnings back in the early 70\'s.I\'ve found all but who did the cross burnings,where could I find this information?
text:
Have you tried the New Hanover County Public Library? Here's a link:
http://www.nhcgov.com/AgnAndDpt/LIBR/Pages/DeptInfo.aspx
